sn35.233:4.1: Ekaṃ samayaṃ āyasmā ca ānando āyasmā ca kāmabhū kosambiyaṃ viharanti ghositārāme.
sn35.233:4.2: Atha kho āyasmā kāmabhū sāyanhasamayaṃ paṭisallānā vuṭṭhito yenāyasmā ānando tenupasaṅkami;
sn35.233:4.4: Sammodanīyaṃ kathaṃ sāraṇīyaṃ vītisāretvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
sn35.233:4.5: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho āyasmā kāmabhū āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ etadavoca:
sn35.233:5.1: “Kiṃ nu kho, āvuso ānanda, cakkhu rūpānaṃ saṃyojanaṃ, rūpā cakkhussa saṃyojanaṃ … pe …
sn35.233:5.2: jivhā rasānaṃ saṃyojanaṃ, rasā jivhāya saṃyojanaṃ … pe …
sn35.233:5.3: mano dhammānaṃ saṃyojanaṃ, dhammā manassa saṃyojanan”ti?
sn35.233:6.1: “Na kho, āvuso kāmabhū, cakkhu rūpānaṃ saṃyojanaṃ, na rūpā cakkhussa saṃyojanaṃ.
sn35.233:6.2: Yañca tattha tadubhayaṃ paṭicca uppajjati chandarāgo, taṃ tattha saṃyojanaṃ … pe …
sn35.233:6.3: na jivhā rasānaṃ saṃyojanaṃ, na rasā jivhāya saṃyojanaṃ … pe …
sn35.233:6.4: na mano dhammānaṃ saṃyojanaṃ, na dhammā manassa saṃyojanaṃ.
sn35.233:6.5: Yañca tattha tadubhayaṃ paṭicca uppajjati chandarāgo taṃ tattha saṃyojanaṃ.
sn35.233:7.1: Seyyathāpi, āvuso, kāḷo ca balībaddo odāto ca balībaddo ekena dāmena vā yottena vā saṃyuttā assu.
sn35.233:7.3: ‘kāḷo balībaddo odātassa balībaddassa saṃyojanaṃ, odāto balībaddo kāḷassa balībaddassa saṃyojanan’ti, sammā nu kho so vadamāno vadeyyā”ti?
sn35.233:7.5: “Na kho, āvuso, kāḷo balībaddo odātassa balībaddassa saṃyojanaṃ, napi odāto balībaddo kāḷassa balībaddassa saṃyojanaṃ.
sn35.233:7.6: Yena ca kho te ekena dāmena vā yottena vā saṃyuttā, taṃ tattha saṃyojanaṃ.
sn35.233:7.7: Evameva kho, āvuso, na cakkhu rūpānaṃ saṃyojanaṃ, na rūpā cakkhussa saṃyojanaṃ … pe …
sn35.233:7.10: yañca tattha tadubhayaṃ paṭicca uppajjati chandarāgo, taṃ tattha saṃyojanan”ti.
